ROW.PDT: *IF ( ( *VALUE KCA_UX_Alerts_Table.Alert_Text *EQ Agent_Management_Services_watchdog_not_reliable ) *OR ( *VALUE KCA_UX_Alerts_Table.Alert_Text *EQ Agent_exceeded_restart_count ) *OR ( *VALUE KCA_UX_Alerts_Table.Alert_Text *EQ Agent_manual_stop_failed ) *OR ( *VALUE KCA_UX_Alerts_Table.Alert_Text *EQ Agent_overutilizing_CPU ) *OR ( *VALUE KCA_UX_Alerts_Table.Alert_Text *EQ Agent_overutilizing_memory ) *OR ( *VALUE KCA_UX_Alerts_Table.Alert_Text *EQ Agent_restart_failed ) )

ROW.MAP: <situation name="c_uxm4_itm_x_agent_errors" ><class name="ITM_KCA_UX_Alerts_Table" /><slot slotName="msg" ><literalString value="ITM6 OS Agent alert: $KCA_UX_Alerts_Table.Alert_Text$ - $KCA_UX_Alerts_Table.Alert_Details$" /></slot></situation>
